::?1::
Sits in the room thinking

::?2::
"So your thinking about what Koj said?" She gently pats his shoulder.

::?1::
"What I haven't given it another thought" As he try to cloud his thoughts.

::?2::
"I've known you for too long not to know what your thinking I'm with you on 
whatever you decide to do. Just ask yourself do you believe in yourself and 
believe in the right to make your dreams come true no matter what gets in 
your way?"

::?1::
Thinks of all the adventure they all had "We had some adventures didn't we?"

::?2::
"Yeah we have and we still have time for a few more." She smiles "But I'm 
not going to force you to make a choice."
